page.title: 06WESTWOODSIDE WOMEN'S INST.
page.content: In Westwoodside there is a{Women's {Institute Group.}They have about 100 members who are aged from 20-70. The group meets every 3rd Wednesday of each month, at the{Village Hall.}At a meeting they have tea and a biscuit. The most enjoyable part of a meeting is the demonstration and the speakers. The treasurer has one of the most responsible jobs. The{W.I.}is involved with public affairs and village life. They have a{W.I.}outing every June and an annual meeting. They have a craft day in which pressed flowers and ceramics are on show.
